title: USA Truck CIO to Speak at TMW TransForum 2015 in Orlando, FL
text:
USA Truck
VAN BUREN, Ark. USA Truck, Inc. (NASDAQ: USAK), a leading capacity solutions provider headquartered in Van Buren, AR , today announced the participation of Chris Rhodes , Vice President, Information Services & Chief Information Officer at USA Truck as a contributing presenter to the business intelligence curriculum offered during the annual TMW TransForum User Conference, September 13-16 , in Orlando, FL. TransForum is one of the largest transportation technology educational events in North America , open exclusively to customers of TMW, a leading software and solutions provider to commercial and private fleets, brokerage and 3PL organizations.
Rhodes joined USA Truck in 2013, bringing extensive career experience in IT leadership from previous positions with leading logistics and transportation companies in North America .
As part of the TransForum breakout agenda focused on the fast-growing importance of business intelligence to the success of transportation service providers, Rhodes will join James Langley , Vice President of Business Intelligence and Optimization for TMW, in several sessions to speak about real-world results with TMW solutions at USA Truck.
USA Truck is a customer of TMW Systems and has successfully deployed several TMW software solutions to help improve their operational performance. Rhodes will speak to the benefits achieved by the company and their experience working with TMW transportation industry experts to help the company optimize value realized from TMW Business Intelligence solutions and Value Engineering Services.
"In addition to the valuable industry expertise provided through their consulting services, TMW's ExpertFuel® and MatchAdvice® products have helped USA Truck reduce operating costs and improve efficiency," indicated Russell Overla , Executive Vice President Truckload Operations at USA Truck, Inc.
For more information about the TMW TransForum User Conference, visit www.tmwtransforum.com .
About USA Truck
USA Truck is a capacity solutions provider of transportation and logistics services that include truckload, dedicated contract carriage, intermodal and brokerage spot market throughout North America .
About TMW Systems
TMW is a leading transportation software provider to commercial and private fleets, brokerage and 3PL organizations. Founded in 1983, TMW is focused on providing enterprise software to the transportation industry, including asset-based and non-asset-based operations as well as heavy-duty vehicle service centers. With offices in Cleveland , Dallas , Indianapolis , Nashville , Oklahoma City , Raleigh , and Vancouver , the company serves over 2,000 customers, including many of the largest, most sophisticated and complex transportation service companies in North America . TMW is a Trimble Company (NASDAQ: TRMB) and part of the international Transportation and Logistics Division.
